LABEL: 0xBB
STRING: I can hear the sound of the wind.

LABEL: 0xFA
STRING: The grass sways in the gentle breeze, bringing with it the scent of white flowers.

LABEL: 0x153
STRING: A clear starry sky, which I hadn't seen in years, stretches endlessly across my eyes.

LABEL: 0x1CC
STRING: Ah, that's right. I've finally reached the outside.

LABEL: 0x247
STRING: "You've finally broken free from that place, haven't you?"

LABEL: 0x2A5
STRING: A girl I knew well whispered in a familiar voice.

LABEL: 0x2FA
STRING: Her young figure, a vision from a distant past.

LABEL: 0x36D
STRING: "You don't need to worry about him anymore."

LABEL: 0x3EA
STRING: "You are already free now. You can go wherever you wish."

LABEL: 0x45E
STRING: ...Ah, I see. Is that so...

LABEL: 0x4AB
STRING: After making many sacrifices, I had finally earned my freedom.

LABEL: 0x52E
STRING: "The future is marked on the dice you roll..."

LABEL: 0x5A5
STRING: "What form will it take?"

LABEL: 0x730
STRING: Misato

LABEL: 0x740
STRING: "How was this world like? What kind of a place did it feel like to you?"

LABEL: 0x8C9
STRING: Misato

LABEL: 0x8D9
STRING: "After being deceived so much and made a fool of so much... can you still say that it was a beautiful world?"

LABEL: 0x9EC
STRING: ...I don't know.

LABEL: 0xAB5
STRING: %Z"I" had seen many different worlds.

LABEL: 0xB0C
STRING: For example, the flower of disappointment.

LABEL: 0xB53
STRING: Someone clung to me, and I became zero at the end of it.

LABEL: 0xBA6
STRING: For example, the flower of remembrance.

LABEL: 0xBED
STRING: I affirmed the impostor, and was welcomed into a world I could not escape.

LABEL: 0xC48
STRING: For example, the flower of promise.

LABEL: 0xC8F
STRING: I closed my eyes and trapped myself in a shell of delusion.

LABEL: 0xCE0
STRING: For example, the flower of hope.

LABEL: 0xD27
STRING: I teamed up with a successful person to create a lasting success.

LABEL: 0xD80
STRING: For example, the flower of danger.

LABEL: 0xDC7
STRING: I kept running away from misfortune and eventually was lost to disaster.

LABEL: 0xE22
STRING: For example, the flower of shyness.

LABEL: 0xE69
STRING: An inexplicable madness has taken over someone I cared about.

LABEL: 0xEC2
STRING: ―Ah, certainly.

LABEL: 0xF07
STRING: I've been deceived, made a fool of.

LABEL: 0xF5A
STRING: There's no such thing as a happy ending in here.

LABEL: 0xFAF
STRING: Because those endings are "their" happy endings.

LABEL: 0x1022
STRING: The universal human definition of "happiness" cannot be applied to these girls.

LABEL: 0x1137
STRING: Misato

LABEL: 0x1147
STRING: "This is a planet of love, madness and the bizzare."

LABEL: 0x12C0
STRING: Misato

LABEL: 0x12D0
STRING: "The ending『you』are looking for isn't going to be handed to you on a silver platter."

LABEL: 0x1461
STRING: Misato

LABEL: 0x1471
STRING: "However......"

LABEL: 0x1541
STRING: I've taken away many people's futures... I wonder if I have any right to be happy.

LABEL: 0x1658
STRING: Misato

LABEL: 0x1668
STRING: "It's not luck that decides your fate."

LABEL: 0x17E7
STRING: Misato

LABEL: 0x17F7
STRING: "Your fate was always decided by yourself, by your own actions, wasn't it?"

LABEL: 0x198C
STRING: Misato

LABEL: 0x199C
STRING: "You wanted to 'win' at this game at the expense of someone else, or something else..."

LABEL: 0x1B3F
STRING: Misato

LABEL: 0x1B4F
STRING: "That's why you kept rolling the dice so many times, isn't it?"

LABEL: 0x1C3F
STRING: ─Yes. Even now, I still wanted to win.

LABEL: 0x1C96
STRING: So I kept rolling the dice over and over again until I won.

LABEL: 0x1CFB
STRING: So that I could obtain true freedom...

LABEL: 0x1DE8
STRING: Misato

LABEL: 0x1DF8
STRING: "If you wish it, this world will answer."

LABEL: 0x1F7F
STRING: Misato

LABEL: 0x1F8F
STRING: "So... once more, roll the dice again."

LABEL: 0x2110
STRING: Misato

LABEL: 0x2120
STRING: "Until you obtain the number you wished for..."

LABEL: 0x2232
STRING: As she said that, I opened my hand.

LABEL: 0x2283
STRING: The die was in my hand, as if it was the most natural thing in the world.

LABEL: 0x22D8
STRING: The six-sided cube that has determined my future up till now.

LABEL: 0x232B
STRING: I'm going to roll the die.

LABEL: 0x2374
STRING: The number I rolled was―

LABEL: Custom33
STRING: "Did you know? That the sum of opposite sides of a die is always 7?"

LABEL: 0x2617
STRING: Something...

LABEL: 0x264E
STRING: I feel like I'm forgetting something... very, very important.

LABEL: Custom43
STRING: "We can't resist the fate that God has set for us.%NBecause that's how he made it."

LABEL: 0x275C
STRING: What was it, that very, very important thing that I forgot?

LABEL: Custom53
STRING: "But if you want to defy fate, you have to roll the largest number."

LABEL: 0x2862
STRING: A very, very important person...

LABEL: 0x28A9
STRING: Can I remember everything that's ever happened to me, everyone I've ever met?

LABEL: Custom63
STRING: "Please never forget these words."

LABEL: Custom73
STRING: "It's a magic charm... to help you obtain glory."

LABEL: 0x2A34
STRING: Nana......

LABEL: 0x2A6D
STRING: Nana's... not here...

LABEL: 0x2AAC
STRING: Nana is nowhere to be found.

LABEL: 0x2AF3
STRING: She was always so close to me, watching over me...

LABEL: 0x2BD8
STRING: There were two very innocent and pure grade schoolers.

LABEL: 0x2C33
STRING: I grabbed her arm and she's staring at my face.

LABEL: 0x2C90
STRING: Silent, like we were waiting for time to move again.

LABEL: 0x2D35
STRING: Her name is Nana, and she's like a childhood friend.

LABEL: 0x2D8C
STRING: Our families lived in the same condo, in neighbouring units.

LABEL: 0x2DEF
STRING: We weren't really acquainted with each other, but we knew each other's faces and names.

LABEL: 0x2EC8
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x2ED6
STRING: "...I think that if I fell from here, I'd die."

LABEL: 0x2F3C
STRING: I wasn't sure if I should ask her what she was going to do, but she started talking to me first.

LABEL: 0x2FFB
STRING: ─It all started a few minutes ago.

LABEL: 0x3040
STRING: I came home from school, got off the elevator, and headed for the door of my place.

LABEL: 0x30AB
STRING: I found her in the middle of the external walkway, leaning over the railing.

LABEL: 0x311E
STRING: I had a bad feeling and grabbed her arm by instinct.

LABEL: 0x31E3
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x31F1
STRING: "Metarou, don't stop me. It's not something I decided to do on a whim."

LABEL: 0x3262
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x3270
STRING: "It just keeps piling up, and I just can't take it anymore. I've done my best to prepare myself."

LABEL: 0x32FA
STRING: With a gloomy expression, Nana tells me what's on her mind.

LABEL: 0x334F
STRING: I think I understand why, too.

LABEL: 0x33EC
STRING: Every night, every night... I hear screams coming from behind the walls.

LABEL: 0x3453
STRING: A mournful cry that doesn't seem to belong to a human being.

LABEL: 0x34AA
STRING: My family is peaceful and no one in my family ever makes such a voice.

LABEL: 0x350B
STRING: Her home must be an abnormal place that is far beyond my imagination.

LABEL: 0x357C
STRING: I'm convinced that it's her domestic situation that has driven her to this.

LABEL: 0x35DF
STRING: So I knew it wasn't a temporary feeling, and I knew that it wasn't on a whim that she wanted to die.

LABEL: 0x36A6
STRING: Even so... I wanted to stop her.

LABEL: 0x36F7
STRING: While I was growing up in a warm and happy home, she was in a state of deep despair.

LABEL: 0x3774
STRING: It was because I didn't realize it until this moment, that I was trapped like this.

LABEL: 0x3857
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x3865
STRING: "Hey. Let me go... Why are you stopping me?"

LABEL: 0x38C1
STRING: What can I do when she says something like this?

LABEL: 0x3922
STRING: What can a mere child who has lived for only ten or so years do?

LABEL: 0x39A5
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x39B3
STRING: "...Maybe this is a wild thing to ask. If someone is trying to kill themselves, it's normal to try to stop them, right?"

LABEL: 0x3A43
STRING: "If you live, one day, something good will happen to you"...?

LABEL: 0x3A9E
STRING: "It may be hard now, but once you get through this, you'll have a happy future"...?

LABEL: 0x3B19
STRING: I don't think such cheap platitudes can break her resolve.

LABEL: 0x3BD8
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x3BE6
STRING: "Well then, let's decide this by rolling a die. If I roll a... 7, then I'll live."

LABEL: 0x3C7D
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x3C8B
STRING: "But if not... then..."

LABEL: 0x3D44
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x3D52
STRING: "I want you to kill me."

LABEL: 0x3DA2
STRING: When I heard those words, I was shocked from the bottom of my heart.

LABEL: 0x3DFB
STRING: What kind of silly thing is this girl saying?

LABEL: 0x3E56
STRING: "That's impossible, because the die only has the numbers 1 to 6," I said.

LABEL: 0x3F2B
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x3F39
STRING: "You don't think that's possible, do you?"

LABEL: 0x3F96
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x3FA4
STRING: "But did you know that when you put the two sides of a die together, it comes out to seven?"

LABEL: 0x401E
STRING: Why did she say that to me?

LABEL: 0x40D7
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x40E5
STRING: "So no matter what number you roll, there's always the existence of 'seven'."

LABEL: 0x414D
STRING: You didn't really want to die, did you?

LABEL: 0x41A0
STRING: I think you wanted to live more than anything.

LABEL: 0x41F9
STRING: Maybe you wanted me to help you...

LABEL: 0x42AC
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x42BA
STRING: "Don't forget, Metarou."

LABEL: 0x4304
STRING: I'm sure she's......

LABEL: 0x4345
STRING: Waiting for a miracle, believing that the roll will be seven.

LABEL: 0x43FC
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x440A
STRING: "Nana will always be by your side."

LABEL: 0x4462
STRING: Then she threw the die high in the air......

LABEL: 0x4758
STRING: I hear the sound of water dripping.

LABEL: 0x4797
STRING: The air in this musty underground jail is choked with dust.

LABEL: 0x47E6
STRING: Why was I taken here? How long was I confined here? I can't remember.

LABEL: 0x4867
STRING: I feel like I've been in here for a very long time already...

LABEL: 0x48C0
STRING: My cellmate is quietly playing with some stones in his hand, as usual.

LABEL: 0x4933
STRING: He is throwing a cube-shaped stone up high, and catching it.

LABEL: 0x4991
STRING: It's probably just a way of killing time.

LABEL: 0x49B4
STRING: ...There's no way out of here anyway.

LABEL: 0x4A1D
STRING: Man

LABEL: 0x4A29
STRING: "Hey, you still alive?"

LABEL: 0x4A75
STRING: The man's voice echoed throughout the silent cell.

LABEL: 0x4ABD
STRING: He sometimes strikes a conversation like this.

LABEL: 0x4AFA
STRING: And each time I answer with something that seems appropriate.

LABEL: 0x4B59
STRING: Man

LABEL: 0x4B65
STRING: "It looks like this cell is going to be cleared out tomorrow. It might be our last chance to get out of here."

LABEL: 0x4C3D
STRING: The man held out one of his old dice, and showed it to me.

LABEL: 0x4CB2
STRING: Man

LABEL: 0x4CBE
STRING: "Let's make a bet."

LABEL: 0x4D11
STRING: Man

LABEL: 0x4D1D
STRING: "We each roll the die, and the bigger number wins."

LABEL: 0x4D8E
STRING: Man

LABEL: 0x4D9A
STRING: "The loser becomes the bait and lets the winner escape. How about it? Isn't it worth a try?"

LABEL: 0x4E2D
STRING: Man

LABEL: 0x4E39
STRING: "You and me both, we're going to be executed soon. So what have you got to lose?"

LABEL: 0x4EB7
STRING: I'm reluctant as he could be cheating, but I decide to take him up on his offer.

LABEL: 0x4F31
STRING: ...Anyway, it's going to be all over soon.

LABEL: 0x4F62
STRING: There wasn't any hope from the start.

LABEL: 0x4FB7
STRING: Man

LABEL: 0x4FC3
STRING: "It's settled then. Well, please excuse me."

LABEL: 0x5039
STRING: He threw the die high in the air, and at last, it rolled on the ground.

LABEL: 0x5098
STRING: The die's face revealed... 6.

LABEL: 0x50EF
STRING: Man

LABEL: 0x50FB
STRING: "Ah... 6, is it."

LABEL: 0x513F
STRING: I have no way to win unless I roll another 6 and force a rematch.

LABEL: 0x51CE
STRING: I gulped, and rolled the die.

LABEL: 0x5277
STRING: The die's face revealed a...

LABEL: 0x5320
STRING: My roll was... a 7...

LABEL: 0x5377
STRING: Man

LABEL: 0x53BF
STRING: To my surprise, the old die broke into two and separated into 1 and 6.

LABEL: 0x5426
STRING: I was finally able to win my match against him.

LABEL: 0x5483
STRING: Ahh... now I can finally get out of here...!

LABEL: 0x553A
STRING: Man

LABEL: 0x5546
STRING: "I'm surprised... so something like this could happen."

LABEL: 0x55B3
STRING: Man

LABEL: 0x55BF
STRING: "You're awesome. Maybe if it's you... then you could really make it out of here."

LABEL: 0x5692
STRING: Man

LABEL: 0x569E
STRING: "It's okay. I'll be the decoy. Get going quickly."

LABEL: 0x5700
STRING: Even though he had just lost the match, the man was smiling, wrinkles forming on his gaunt face.

LABEL: 0x5773
STRING: Maybe he's doing this on purpose to get me to leave?

LABEL: 0x57D6
STRING: ...No way, no way, that's ridiculous, he couldn't have thought that far ahead to set this up.

LABEL: 0x5869
STRING: Man

LABEL: 0x5875
STRING: "Ah... but there's one thing I need you to do for me."

LABEL: 0x58F2
STRING: Man

LABEL: 0x58FE
STRING: "If you ever run into my family out there, please... help them out for me."

LABEL: 0x59DC
STRING: Matarou

LABEL: 0x59EE
STRING: "My wife 'Mikoto', my son 'Mitarou'... I've always regretted leaving the two of them behind."

LABEL: 0x5A8D
STRING: Matarou

LABEL: 0x5A9F
STRING: "So please... tell them."

LABEL: 0x5B00
STRING: Matarou

LABEL: 0x5B12
STRING: "I'll definitely find a way to return to them..."

LABEL: 0x5B6E
STRING: His determined gaze was firmly fixed on my path.

LABEL: 0x5BEF
STRING: Matarou

LABEL: 0x5C01
STRING: "Go now. To the final future that you'll ever need to grasp."

LABEL: 0x5C70
STRING: Matarou

LABEL: 0x5C82
STRING: "To the future you obtained from the seventh roll..."

LABEL: 0x5CCE
STRING: Matarou's words pushed me forward.

LABEL: 0x5D21
STRING: I didn't have the negative feelings in my heart that I used to have.

LABEL: 0x5D76
STRING: My heart was filled with a pure desire to advance straight forward...

LABEL: 0x607B
STRING: I've done something I can't take back.

LABEL: 0x60D2
STRING: Something I would never be forgiven for, and something I never expected.

LABEL: 0x612F
STRING: I... can't be forgiven.

LABEL: 0x61E2
STRING: ─I wonder if I had fallen asleep.

LABEL: 0x6231
STRING: I was having a strange, happy dream.

LABEL: 0x627A
STRING: But there was no sign of her there...

LABEL: 0x62C7
STRING: There was just me, who was empty, and some hollow words expressed in the language of flowers.

LABEL: 0x6320
STRING: This is a white room, a room inside a hospital.

LABEL: 0x6365
STRING: I was leaning back on the bed, and then I sat up.

LABEL: 0x6410
STRING: She was in front of me.

LABEL: 0x6455
STRING: Lying in bed, never to wake up again.

LABEL: 0x64B6
STRING: The doctors pronounced her brain dead.

LABEL: 0x6505
STRING: Dead in basically all respects.

LABEL: 0x653E
STRING: I looked at her lifeless face and realized how close she was to death.

LABEL: 0x6599
STRING: Does she still dream about that day?

LABEL: 0x65F2
STRING: Or, had all her consciousness already faded away?

LABEL: 0x6649
STRING: On the windowsill is a misshapen bouquet of flowers I've picked.

LABEL: 0x66A8
STRING: ...I'm so silly, please laugh at me.

LABEL: 0x66E9
STRING: Am I foolish enough to think this is a form of atonement?

LABEL: 0x673E
STRING: I'm not going to change anything by doing this.

LABEL: 0x6791
STRING: As a guilty man, I was obliged to spend the rest of my life in prison.

LABEL: 0x67F6
STRING: I'm not going to plead, because I'm aware of my crime.

LABEL: 0x685F
STRING: It was only because of a man named Matarou that I was able to get out temporarily.

LABEL: 0x68C2
STRING: I just wanted to see her, just once, and that's the only reason I came here.

LABEL: 0x6935
STRING: But this reprieve will soon be over.

LABEL: 0x6990
STRING: I'm sure the cops will catch me and I'll be back in that musty cell in a few hours.

LABEL: 0x6A05
STRING: I know that.

LABEL: 0x6A46
STRING: Still, I wanted to spend the final moments I was given with her.

LABEL: 0x6AB1
STRING: I took her hand and squeezed it.

LABEL: 0x6AFA
STRING: Lukewarm, weak, skinny arms.

LABEL: 0x6B45
STRING: But indeed, alive, I can feel her pulse beating in a steady rhythm.

LABEL: 0x6BAC
STRING: I wish it was me, not her, that lay here in a coma.

LABEL: 0x6C09
STRING: If I could have taken her place, she would still be alive and well today.

LABEL: 0x6C74
STRING: How good would it have been to have done that...?

LABEL: 0x6CCF
STRING: Right now, I just want to hold her hand for as long as I can.

LABEL: 0x6D28
STRING: The precious final time that I can be beside her.

LABEL: 0x6D7D
STRING: The last time I can atone and be forgiven.

LABEL: 0x6E82
STRING: It's alright.

LABEL: 0x6EB9
STRING: I haven't forgotten anything.

LABEL: 0x6F02
STRING: I remember them all... all of the precious things and people that are important to me.

LABEL: 0x6F63
STRING: Needless to say, the final moments that we spent together, too.

LABEL: 0x6FAE
STRING: And the way my hands felt when I strangled your neck.

LABEL: 0x6FFF
STRING: And your smiling face at the very end.

LABEL: 0x70EC
STRING: We decided to roll the dice.

LABEL: 0x713F
STRING: To determine our fate...

LABEL: Custom83
STRING: "Sorry to keep you waiting, Nana."

LABEL: Custom93
STRING: "I finally did it, rolled a seven..."

LABEL: 0x742B
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x7439
STRING: "Look."

LABEL: 0x7482
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x7490
STRING: "Someone brought me some flowers."

LABEL: 0x74FB
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x7509
STRING: "Beautiful, right? What were their names again..."

LABEL: 0x757C
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x758A
STRING: "The 6-petaled red flower, Pomegranate. The flower of grace."

LABEL: 0x75F3
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x7601
STRING: "The 5-petaled pink flower, Rhododendron. The flower of dignity."

LABEL: 0x7672
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x7680
STRING: "The 4-petaled orange flower, Hanabishi. The flower of success."

LABEL: 0x76FB
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x7709
STRING: "The 3-petaled white flower, Clover. The flower of happiness."

LABEL: 0x7776
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x7784
STRING: "The 2-petaled blue flower, Rosemary. The flower of memories."

LABEL: 0x77F9
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x7807
STRING: "The 1-petaled purple flower, Muscari. The flower which buries despair."

LABEL: 0x7878
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x7886
STRING: "It's like they've been inside my head."

LABEL: 0x78F1
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x78FF
STRING: "Yes, I had a dream today."

LABEL: 0x7A36
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x7A44
STRING: "A dream where I became Metarou's girlfriend."

LABEL: 0x7AA9
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x7AB7
STRING: "I went to school and worked, wearing cute clothes like at a maid cafe."

LABEL: 0x7B3E
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x7B4C
STRING: "...It's strange, I've been asleep since grade school."

LABEL: 0x7BC9
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x7BD7
STRING: "For example, I dreamt..."

LABEL: 0x7C2A
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x7C38
STRING: "Of fighting over Metarou and killing a crazy girl."

LABEL: 0x7CB9
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x7CC7
STRING: "Of being tricked by a beautiful teacher and buried in the mountains."

LABEL: 0x7D44
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x7D52
STRING: "Of being worried for Metarou and killing him in a ruined building."

LABEL: 0x7DDB
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x7DE9
STRING: "Of Metarou working with a Utuber as their assistant."

LABEL: 0x7E78
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x7E86
STRING: "Of trying to protect Metarou from a girl cursed with misfortune."

LABEL: 0x7EFF
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x7F0D
STRING: "Of being protected by Metarou from a stalker who is younger than me."

LABEL: 0x7F98
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x7FA6
STRING: "It must be because I couldn't move my body, so my mind became active."

LABEL: 0x8033
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x8041
STRING: "...It's almost time, isn't it?"

LABEL: 0x809E
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x80AC
STRING: "To say farewell. We'll never meet again."

LABEL: 0x8131
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x813F
STRING: "Thank you for listening to this long story."

LABEL: 0x81AA
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x81B8
STRING: "Well then, see you again."

LABEL: 0x8513
STRING: TRUE END「Rolling a Seven」/ Extra got new content!
